about_the_game:
Whatever you choose, they are always watching …

Creatures After Calamity is a monster battler in which your animals remember how you treat them. Build a team, execute a strategy, and outsmart your opponents before your creatures turn on you.

With strategic gameplay that is easy to learn but difficult to master, you can make meaningful choices from the jump. But be careful — from necessary sacrifices to desperate gambits, your creatures will judge you for every decision you make.

KEY FEATURES
* build dynamic, fraught relationships with your companion creatures as you send them to die for our mistakes.
* make teams and execute strategies in a system that emphasizes smart predictions and bold plays.
* battle online with a customizable sandbox for competitive play.
* test your skills with a smorgasbord of single-player modes.
* discover the secrets of an irradiated, post-apocalyptic world where animals rule.
* wonder why your creatures listen to you at all, when most of the monsters in this world would sooner eat you alive …

content_descriptors.notes: References to animal harm, climate apocalypse, and social upheaval.
